summary: This mod replaces the ugly default Jarl outfits (type1, 3 variants) for females with a complete retexture using the Barkeeper Outfit as a base.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/39843-1-1389307027.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Summary:[/size][/b][/color]
Replaces the default blue, green, and orange Jarl outfits with a completely retextured Jarl outfit with a new mesh based on the Barkeeper outfit, with the cloak from the Jarl's outfit included.

[b]Install package includes:[/b]
-CBBE Jarl's Outfit meshes & textures
-BodySlide files for Better Jarl Outfit, found under "CBA - JarlOutfit"
-BodySlide data for Vanilla Jarl Outfits found under CBA - Jarl - Blue/Green/Orange

These meshes have all sliders for [b]C[/b]aliente [b]B[/b]ody [b]A[/b]dvanced, which is just the new name for CB++ as of the release of Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio.

All sliders for my Better Jarl Outfit should work perfectly in BodySlide. The vanilla outfits however I recommend not using BreastSSH or DoubleMelon, but you can achieve similar results with BreastSH and BreastFantasy.

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Required:[/size][/b][/color]
[color=red]REQUIRED:[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente Beautiful Bodies Edition - CBBE[/url]
[color=orange]OPTIONAL:[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]BodySlide 2[/url] - only if you want to use that portion of the mod

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Getting it to Work:[/size][/b][/color]
[b]Standard installation:[/b]
1. Install via NMM.
2. Jarl's outfits should be changed retroactively to the new ones, if you're able to kill them you should be able to loot it from their bodies. If they're nude you can open console and click them then type disable then enable and it'll refresh them so they're clothed. This won't happen on a new save, some things are just baked into saves with Skyrim.
3. If you want to add them via other means then use console, "help jarl's blue" or "help jarl's green" or "help jarl's orange" or "help jarl's red" and it'll provide you codes to use, then use player.additem ####### 1, with # being the code you were given and 1 being how many you want.

[b]Vanilla to CBA only:[/b]
If you do not want the Better Jarl Outfits and just want to CBBE-ify the vanilla jarl outfits then uncheck the included ESP then go to your Bodyslide folder, which should be located within your Data folder inside CalienteTools/Bodyslide.

Look for CBA - Jarl - Blue/Green/Orange, slide them to you liking.

[b]Bodyslide[/b]
In the directory described in the section just above, follow the previous steps except now choose the CBA - JarlOutfit instead and slide it to your liking.

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Changelog:[/size][/b][/color]
3.1 - January 9, 2014 - Minor update, ESP only. Requires version 3. Adds Jarl's Red Outfit, obtainable only via console.
3.0 - January 9, 2014 - Fixed cloak, included bodyslide data, includes and bodyslide data for vanilla outfits.
2.0 - August 27, 2013 - Version 2 released CBBE dependent but including cloaks
1.0 - August 07, 2013 - Initial Release

[color=#5ea2e5][b][size=6]Known Issues:[/size][/b][/color]
-Banner may not look straight in-game. This is due to skeletons and idles most likely as it looks perfect in Nifskope as you can see in the preview images. It's a real wonky UV to texture for lemme tell ya...
author: XunAmarox
